description:
The svalbard light cotton Shorts is a lightweight and packable hiking and trekking shorts made in organic cotton, recycled polyamide and an elastane mix. Comfort and durability is key to this product, as well as a progressive Norrøna look. This shorts features hand pockets with a hidden zipped security pocket for spare money or other belongings for the backpacking user, two back pockets, custom waist system and belt loops.

You will also get top stitches at critical areas for increased durability and an embroided logo. The fit is regular.
name: Norrona Svalbard Light Cotton Shorts - Mens
